pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Calculations for Cluster-Randomized and Cluster-Randomized Crossover Trials // Calculate power for cluster randomized trials (CRTs) that compare two means, two proportions, or two counts using closed-form solutions. In addition, calculate power for cluster randomized crossover trials using Monte Carlo methods. For more information, see Reich et al. (2012) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0035564.
